section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
Reports in Finnish. 
Discussion events and forums.
goals__remit: EVA is a policy and pro-market think tank financed by the Finnish business community. EVA is a discussion forum and networking arena for decision-makers both in business and society. EVA publishes reports, organizes debates and publishes policy proposals.
